Discard any number of cards, then draw that many.
chapel: Trash up to 4 cards from your hand.
moat:
+2 Cards

When another player plays an Attack card, you may first reveal this from your hand, to be unaffected by it.

+1 Action

+1 Card
+1 Action

The first time you play a silver this turn, +1<:coin:377195990010298368>
vassal:

Discard the top card of your deck. If it's an Action card, play it.
workshop: Gain a card costing up to 4<:coin:377195990010298368>
bureaucrat: Gain a Silver onto your deck. Each other player reveals a Victory card from their hand and puts it onto their deck (or reveals a hand with no Victory cards).
gardens: Worth 1<:VP:377195966471864320> per 10 cards you have (round down).
militia:
+2<:coin:377195990010298368>

Each other player discards down to 3 cards in hand.
moneylender: You may trash a Copper from your hand for +3<:coin:377195990010298368>.

+1 Card
+1Action
+1<:coin:377195990010298368>

Discard a card per empty supply pile.
remodel:
Trash a card from your hand.
Gain a card costing up to 2<:coin:377195990010298368> more than it.
throne-room: You may play an Action card from your hand twice.
bandit: Gain a Gold. Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of their deck, trashes a revealed Treasure other than Copper, and discards the rest.
council-room:
+4 Cards
+1 Buy

Each other player draws a card.
library: Draw until you have 7 cards in hand, skipping any Action cards you choose to; set those aside, discarding them afterwards.
mine: You may trash a Treasure from your hand. Gain a Treasure to your hand costing up to 3<:coin:377195990010298368> more than it.
sentry:
+1 Card
+1 Action

Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Trash and/or discard any number of them. Put the rest back on top in any order.
witch:
+2 Cards

Each other player gains a Curse.
artisan:
Gain a card to your hand costing up to 5<:coin:377195990010298368>.
Put a card from your hand onto your deck.
chancellor:
+2<:coin:377195990010298368>

You may immediatlt put your deck onto your discard pile.
feast:
Trash this card.
Gain a card costing up to 5<:coin:377195990010298368>.
spy:
+1 Card
+1 Action

Each player (including you) reveals the top card of his deck and either discards it or puts it back, your choice.
thief: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck. If they revealed any Treasure cards, they trash one of them that you choose. You may gain any or all of these trashed cards. They discard the other revealed cards.
adventurer: Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal 2 Treasure cards. Put those Treasure cards into your hand and discard the other revealed cards.
courtyard:
+3 Cards

Put a card from your hand onto your deck.
lurker:
+1 Action

Choose one: Trash an Action card from the Supply, or gain an Action card from the trash.
pawn: Choose two: +1 Card; +1 Action; +1 Buy; +1<:coin:377195990010298368>. The choices must be different.
masquerade:
+2 Cards

Each player with any cards in hand passes one to the next such player to their left, at once. Then you may trash a card from your hand.
shanty-town:
+2 Actions

Reveal your hand. If you have no Action cards in hand, +2 Cards.
steward: Choose one: +2 Cards; or +2<:coin:377195990010298368>; or trash 2 cards from your hand.
swindler:
+2<:coin:377195990010298368>

Each other player trashes the top card of their deck and gains a card with the same cost that you choose.
wishing-well:
+1 Card
+1 Action

Name a card, then reveal the top card of your deck. If you named it, put it into your hand.
baron:

You may discard an Estate for +4<:coin:377195990010298368>. If you don't, gain an Estate.

+2 Cards

replace: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to 2<:coin:377195990010298368> more than it. If the gained card is an Action or Treasure, put it onto your deck; if it's a Victory card, each other player gains a Curse.
torturer:
+3 Cards

Each other player either discards 2 cards or gains a Curse to their hand, their choice. (They may pick an option they can't do.)
trading-post: Trash 2 cards from your hand. If you did, gain a Silver to your hand.

+1 Card
+1 Action

Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing exactly 1<:coin:377195990010298368> more than it.
secret-chamber:
Discard any number of cards. +1<:coin:377195990010298368> per card discarded.
---------------
When another player plays an Attack card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, +2 Cards, then put 2 cards from your hand on top of your deck.
coppersmith: Copper produces an extra 1<:coin:377195990010298368> this turn.
scout:
+1 Action

Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Put the revealed Victory cards into your hand. Put the other cards on top of your deck in any order.
saboteur: Each other player reveals cards from the top of his deck until revealing one costing 3<:coin:377195990010298368> or more. He trashes that card and may gain a card costing at most 2<:coin:377195990010298368> less than it. He discards the other revealed cards.

Each other player reveals cards from the top of his deck until he reveals a Victory or Curse card. He puts it on top and discards the other revealed cards.

When another player plays an Attack card, you may set this aside from your hand. If you do, then at the start of your next turn, +1 Card and return this to your hand.

tournament: Each player may reveal a Province from his hand. If you do, discard it and gain a Prize (from the Prize pile) or a Duchy, putting it on top of your deck. If no-one else does, +1 Card, +1<:coin:377195990010298368>.
young-witch:
+2 Cards

Discard 2 cards. Each other player may reveal a Bane card from his hand. If he doesn't, he gains a Curse.
